greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Decimal expansion of (1084467 + 707402*sqrt(2))/647^2.
comment: Equals lim_{n -> infinity} b(n)/b(n-1) for n mod 3 = 0, b = A130013.
Equals lim_{n -> infinity} b(n)/b(n-1) for n mod 3 = 1, b = A159641.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
xref: Cf. A130013, A159641, A002193 (decimal expansion of sqrt(2)), A159642 (decimal expansion of (649+36*sqrt(2))/647).
results.author: _Klaus Brockhaus_, Apr 21 2009
